website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for those who need a brush for styling and for those with short or thinning hair. Not as versatile as other options.
pros: Best for fresh cuts, laying down frizz, polishing waves, vertical brushing, tender-headed wavers and thinning hair
Also a gentle brush for children

customer_reviews.title: this brush is definitely one of the best soft torino pro i have use it it has ...
customer_reviews.text: this brush is definitely one of the best soft torino pro i have use it it has just enuff pull to relax your hair but soft enuff to polish it. This brush is really 2 brushes .. Must have
customer_reviews.author: Jay Why

customer_reviews.title: bristles fall out
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how much this brush is helping, but it is a true softee. Feels good when brushing. Lost a star for all the bristles that have fallen out even after two weeks of brushing 4/27/2017 - Haven't used this brush in months but the bristles are still falling out, probably would go another way if I had to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Carter

customer_reviews.title: This brush is a good finisher to my red Torino medium
customer_reviews.text: This brush is a good finisher to my red Torino medium. I have noticed that using the brush I find blond bristles regularly coming out into my hair. It's not a vast amount but it has been consistent. The brush does cover a full section as I brush and is very soft and caressing. A good brush overall, just need to enhance the prevention of loose bristles a bit more
customer_reviews.author: J.Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Black and Gold Torino Wave Brush
customer_reviews.text: Very good brush! Love the colors it has and most importantly it keeps my waves looking fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush I mainly use it after a fresh cut because it’s so soft
customer_reviews.author: La

customer_reviews.title: Solid brush
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell the difference between this and the TP500
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Angel feathers.
customer_reviews.text: This softie puts the hair down! Light pressure and hear the angels serenade of brush work being done.
customer_reviews.author: Mikkel

customer_reviews.title: BEST BOAR BRISTLE BRUSH!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best boar bristle brush ever made on this planet. This brush you can use on a fresh cut, mid wolf, late wolf. This brush will give you pull and lay hair down no matter wat
customer_reviews.author: xP2iNc3x

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for soft hair.
customer_reviews.text: Great brush for soft hair. Do not use on wet hair. We do not go on trips without it.
customer_reviews.author: H B P

customer_reviews.title: Great finisher
customer_reviews.text: This brush is great for laying down hair and adding polish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The brush in hand feels good, and brushes good
customer_reviews.text: The brush in hand feels good, and brushes good, but the bristles keep falling our. A few have fell in my eye.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Its just a normal brush people pay the Price of ...
customer_reviews.text: Its just a normal brush people pay the Price of it because its long and very soft I would say anything brush will work
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it my waves have shown major progress since it’s arrival and can’t wait to get more
customer_reviews.author: Jevon Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality soft brush
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality soft brush. I was using an Annie before and this blows it out of the water. I recommend this brush for anyone looking to get great quality at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great brush. Hands down.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best soft brushes I have ever used.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brush
customer_reviews.text: It's a great brush, excellent on fresh cuts lays my hair down A1 quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush. Very soft but has pull like a medium. Lays your hair down well. My favorite soft brush by far.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives great shine best used after shower or after you take your wave cap off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This brush is good for brushing products in hair and laying it down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jungle Fever- Soft with some pull good for using after a good session with a med ...
customer_reviews.text: Dope brush! Bought based on reviews only regret not buying it sooner! I have 3 Torino brushes all dope! TP350 aka Larry Hoover, TP170 AKA Pink Panther, TP 2556 AKA Jungle Fever. Jungle Fever- Soft with some pull good for using after a good session with a med or hard.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Soft Brush for the Price
customer_reviews.text: My husband has thinning hair and the the bristles did not hurt his head, so he really loved this brush. We have purchased pricier Kent brushes in the past and the softness of the bristles is equivalent. However, the bristles do fall out easier, but it is still a good brush for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ply

customer_reviews.title: Interesting Brush.
customer_reviews.text: Brush is really soft. Softy not medium soft. It is a great brush. Bristles are soft, long, and smooth. The brush looks beautiful as well of course. First time trying Torino pro and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you need a good soft wave brush. Buy this. And I'm an OG waver.
customer_reviews.author: Kendell Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Torino pros are awesome took my waves to the next level
customer_reviews.text: This soft brush is very good for the perfect lay down while I'm wolfing after I use the 0656 medium .
customer_reviews.author: Sean Gamblin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush here is my fav softy ever. I just love stroking my hair with this brush
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this brush as a gift to my mother-in-law whose battling leukemia. The smile on her face after feeling that massage on her newly growing hair was amazing. Needless to say this brush is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: D. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Best softy in the game
customer_reviews.text: First off, I'm a huge skeptic and a brush snob. But this is truly a brush that has lived up to it's hype. In a world full of sheeple who just like what everybody else likes regardless of quality, I can honestly say that this is the best softy that has ever touched my head. This brand is popular for a reason. Worth every penny. If you're like me and are scared to spend your money on something that's overrated, worry not. This brush and this brand overall are top notch and every waver needs 3 of 'em! -adamthebarber
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is a game changer!! Quality craftmanship. Best soft brush hands down. Its a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Roosevelt jivers

customer_reviews.title: Wow don't think about it just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Great brush, wonderful pull when used for waves. Long white bristles on this brush give it an extravagant look, but it doesn't just look good, this soft brush is great at laying your hair down, and prefect for finishing touches after unragging. I would give this brush 10 stars if I could it's truly in a class by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ross

customer_reviews.title: After looking for a nice boar bristle brush
customer_reviews.text: After looking for a nice boar bristle brush, I personally would not believe any of these reviews. First, there aren't any verified buyers. Second, 100% are 5 star comments, and all the comments are about the same length, looking like the same person wrote them all. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Hair

customer_reviews.title: I like this brush a lot because it has great pull ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this brush a lot because it has great pull for a soft brush it also polishes the hair leaving a shine and it lays the hair down this is a great finishing brush
customer_reviews.author: Julian Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The Trinity and Beyond
customer_reviews.text: The feel of this brush is dope. The way it feels when you brush your hair is crazy.The pull is amazing. 100% A1 Quality
customer_reviews.author: Kenyatta H.

customer_reviews.title: Best soft brush ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is a thing of beauty. It just makes you want to brush your hair the bristles are perfect nice length I have owned all kind of brushes Kent Diane CQP none of those brushes compare to the Torino pro. If you looking for a great soft brush buy the Torino pro Walter Lewis
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pull. Amazing brush with the finest quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pull. Amazing brush with the finest quality. Can't wait to buy more this is my favorite brush in 8 years of waving.
customer_reviews.author: Meliek Whitsett

customer_reviews.title: Great brush i recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This brush has great balance by that i mean it feels good in your hands...its a soft brush but it pulls like a medium it's perfect for those tender headed people...its great for wavers and guys with beards...pretty much you can't go wrong with this brush -FRED HAWKINS-
customer_reviews.author: Fred hawkins

customer_reviews.title: TROINO 2556 SOFT BRUSH
customer_reviews.text: THE 2556 IS HANDS DOWN THE BEST SOFT BRUSH I HAVE EVER USE. LAYS YOUR HAIR DOWN, VERY HIGH QUALITY GLOSSY PAINT FINISH, DON'T THINK ABOUT IT JUST BUY IT. YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR AND THIS BRUSH IS WORTH IT'S WEIGHT IN GOLD!!!! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST BRUSH OUT ON THE MARKET
customer_reviews.text: Best brush you will ever buy in my opinion, it is a very consistent, the brush covers a lot of territory with one stroke and a great quality all around, it is worth every penny and looks great as well and has a very unique look
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: lay down or get down
customer_reviews.text: This brush the Torino Pro 2556 out brush any softy brush that ever came across my head... light weight... great construction... 100% boar bristles that does not shed... great brush for shine and laying down your hair
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered from brush king it has amazing pull and it's not too hard or soft but ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered from brush king it has amazing pull and it's not too hard or soft but just rite I have this one featured in the picture and the white one and love them both and will be ordering more shipment was very fast too also

customer_reviews.title: Talk about beauty this brush is beautiful. With beauty comes an amazing softie with pull
customer_reviews.text: Talk about beauty this brush is beautiful. With beauty comes an amazing softie with pull. Great for all textures @sirr king
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Best finisher.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is literally the best softy in my opinion. Bk really outdid himself as always. It is my go to at the end of my session. Feels like a pillow on the end of the brush. Best finisher brush hands dosn. Bk makes flawless brushes for us wavers and I appreciate what you do for the game and as a person 100%. Best softy hands down imo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush, great for laying down those hairs that want to fight the strokes. The white bristles just makes this brush even more elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Nay Nay

customer_reviews.title: All around best softie.
customer_reviews.text: Best soft brush hands down. Looks beautiful, has great pull and lays your hair down. Will go down as one of the best brushes of all time. Marvin Mj Douglas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is probably one of my favorite soft brushes ever
customer_reviews.text: Torino Pros have always been known for their quality, and this by far is no different. Its soft yet firm at the same time with a please pull that no other brush can compare to. This is probably one of my favorite soft brushes ever.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: This brush is the truth.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought and tried many of brushes in the past waisting money. Bristles falling out or it cracking because of cheap material. The Torino Pro #2556 is the best brush i have purchased, its so good i get bought another one the same day i got this in the mail. Don't sleep on the Torino Pro. (10 $50) LaSonja Motton
customer_reviews.author: LaSonja Motton

customer_reviews.title: Softy Soft
customer_reviews.text: I never been one to care for a soft brush but this is by far one of if not the greatest soft brush ever made. Edward Rand.

customer_reviews.title: One of/if not the best soft brush in the game only competition is another ...
customer_reviews.text: One of/if not the best soft brush in the game only competition is another Torino Pro softy. The pull on this brush is amazing and the quality of the brush as a whole is great. #TorinoGang Scrooge FutureLiving Bradley

product_meta.title: Torino Pro Wave Brush #2556 By Brush King - 9 Row, Soft Wave Brush with Long Bristles - Made with 100% Boar Bristles - Great for Polishing/Laying Down Frizz & Finisher - Great 360 Waves brush
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

Give the Gift of Waving! Nothing says "I Love You" More to a Waver than the Gift of a Brush King Wave Brush. 

 I have a selection of over 20 different wave brushes for all of your waving needs. That's the biggest selection of wave brushes than any other wave brush seller on Amazon! Each and every brush has its own unique purpose and benefit. Check out my entire line of Torino Pro Wave Brushes. To visit the Torino Pro store, click on the Torino Pro link above, right next to the title of this listing. 

 Why Buy Your Wave Brushes from Brush King? 

 Simple. 

 You will be buying your wave brushes from a Master Wave Brush Designer and the maker of Royalty Wave Brushes. 99% of wave brush companies just slap their logo on an already existing hair brush, with no hand in the design process. I am the only one in the industry who designs his own wave brushes from start to finish, with Wavers like you in mind. 

 While other companies settle for putting out mediocre products, the Brush King has made it a priority to give you, the customer, a different wave brush for ALL stages of waving. 

 Have you ever felt like your old, cheap wave brush has lost its pull and you're no longer progressing? LOOK NO FURTHER! Brush King has many different offerings, from extra soft to extra hard, to give you more options; any firmness of bristle you need, Brush King has available! 

 I have different levels of soft, different levels of medium and different levels of hard so that you get exactly what you need at ANY point in your wave journey. 

 Buy now though! Because Brush King Wave Brushes sell fast! They might not be available tomorrow due to high demand and limited supply.
feature_bullets: TORINO PRO #2556 - Good Pull for a Soft Brush (Almost Identical to the TP500 but Firmer & Little More Pull). Great for Fresh Cuts, Laying Down Frizz, Polishing Waves, Vertical Brushing, Tender Headed Wavers & Thinning Hair. The TP2556 is Excellent for Finishing Off Brush Sessions (Brushes Used Right Before You Put Your Durag On). This Brush Does Not Reach the Scalp. NOT FOR Long Hair. Made with 100% Boar Bristles. Great Brush to Introduce Your Little One To Waves!

DO YOU WANT WAVES WITH LESS EFFORT? TIRED OF SPENDING HOURS BRUSHING & SEEING NO PROGRESS? WHAT DO SOME RAPPERS, NBA PLAYERS & TOP YOUTUBE WAVERS HAVE IN COMMON? They all use Torino Pro Wave Brushes! Because they get great waves with less effort & see major progress in less time. Spend less time brushing & more time with your family while still seeing the progress you've been looking for in your waves. Aren't you glad you found a brush that will make waving easier?

YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR: If Wave Brushes Can be Bought for $5-10 here on Amazon, Why is it that Torino Pro Brushes are Always Selling Out? Because Torino Pro Wave Brushes are of Superior Quality; My Bristles Won't Lean, Which Means Faster Progress, Better Connections and the Best Pull. On Top of Being Specifically Designed for Waving, Torino Pro Brushes are Known for Their Exquisite Glossy Candy Paint Finish. Stop Cheating Yourself, Treat Yourself! Your Hair Deserves the Best, Period.

IMAGINE USING YOUR TORINO PRO, Getting Serious Progress & Right After a Wolf, You Get a Fresh Cut, Waves are Spinning, Outfit is Fresh, All Eyes On You & Girls Can't Stop Thinking How Good You Look. When You Have a Brush of This Caliber, THIS COULD BE YOU. Be The Envy of All Your Friends. When People Around You Think of Waves, You'll be the 1st Waver They Think Of; The Dopest Wavers from Around the World Are Using Brush King Wave Brushes. You Only Live Once, You Deserve to Experience Torino Pro.

ALL TORINO PRO BRUSHES INCLUDE A BOX AND A HAIR BRUSH MAINTENANCE INSERT...to help you keep your hair brush looking new and extend the longevity of your wave brush. All of the Do's & Don'ts of Hair Brush Maintenance & Care are found in this insert. YOUR WAVING INVESTMENT IS IMPORTANT TO ME! REST ASSURED YOU'RE BUYING FROM THE AUTHORITY ON WAVE BRUSHES.
